column4: Today: Sunny, with a high near 62. East wind 11 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
Tonight: Partly cloudy, with a low around 41. Northeast wind 6 to 8 mph.
Wednesday: Sunny, with a high near 63. East wind 7 to 9 mph.
Wednesday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 40. East wind around 6 mph becoming calm  after midnight.
Thursday: Sunny, with a high near 68. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph in the afternoon.
Thursday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. Southwest wind around 6 mph.
Friday: Sunny, with a high near 78. Southwest wind 5 to 8 mph.
Friday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.
Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. Light north wind becoming east 5 to 10 mph in the morning.
